page.title: 01ST.MARTINS ISLES OF SCILLY.
page.content: St.Martins is one of five inhabited islands in the Isles of Scilly,it is the third largest island.It lies in the Atlantic Ocean approximately 27 miles from Lands End.On St.Martins there is a resident population of 88 but sometimes fishermen come and stay in cottages or chalets and it increases then.The people of St.Martins live in three little hamlets called Lower Town,Middle Town and Higher Town.Higher Town is the largest hamlet and the most people live there.The island is approximately three kilomeres long and one kilometre wide in the widest place.On the Northern side the landscape is very rocky and it has lots of cliffs.Butthe Southern side is nearly all white sandy beaches,which make a softer landscape.
